meanings.sent1: The unprivileged students did not have access to the same resources as their peers.
meanings.sent2: She felt unprivileged compared to her wealthy classmates.
meanings.sent3: The unprivileged puppy couldn't reach the treat on the high shelf.
meanings.sent4: In the land of the unprivileged, even basic necessities can feel like luxuries.
meanings.sent5: The unprivileged neighborhood was a stark contrast to the affluent area across town.

meanings.definition: Not enjoying the same social or economic benefits as others.
meanings.sent1: Living in an unprivileged community can present many challenges.
meanings.sent2: The unprivileged workers struggled to make ends meet.
meanings.sent3: The unprivileged squirrel couldn't find any nuts for winter.
meanings.sent4: Her unprivileged background served as a constant reminder of her humble beginnings.
meanings.sent5: The unprivileged family relied on community support to survive.
